## How to review

- Setup instructions (commands, env vars, migrations)
- What to test (endpoints/pages/infra changes)
- If this fixes a bug: steps to reproduce before/after

- Env vars / secrets
- DB migrations
- Terraform or infrastructure changes

## Checklist

- [ ] PR targets the correct base branch
- [ ] Tests added/updated where relevant
- [ ] Docs updated where relevant
- [ ] CI/workflows updated where relevant
